data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Eibar.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
An attacking Barcelona player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 8, Martin Braithwaite (Barcelona) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Eibar a goal kick.
In Barcelona Eibar drive forward through Takashi Inui. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 10, Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Eibar.
Eibar's Kike misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Eibar have a dangerous throw-in.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 16, Eibar have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Eibar drive upfield and Edu Exposito gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Barcelona defender.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Eibar.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Ronald Araujo (Barcelona) strikes at Camp Nou but his header is cleared.
In the minute 27, In Barcelona, Barcelona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Eibar in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Eibar throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona surge into the attack at Camp Nou but Oscar Minguezaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 34, Eibar have a goal kick.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Eibar.
Damian Kadzior for Eibar drives towards goal at Camp Nou. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in Barcelona.
Barcelona advance rapidly upfield but Javier Alberola Rojas blows for offside.
Eibar to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In the minute 40, Barcelona to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antoine Griezmann of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, Javier Alberola Rojas awards Eibar a goal kick.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 45, Barcelona needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 45, Javier Alberola Rojas will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Eibar in Barcelona.
In the minute 45, Eibar are pushing forward but Rafa Soares's finish is wide of the goal.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Javier Alberola Rojas blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Ousmane Dembele is replacing Sergino Dest for the home team.
Barcelona are whistled for offside.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Barcelona's Ousmane Dembele breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Eibar goal kick.
In the minute 50, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In Barcelona, Miralem Pjanic (Barcelona) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Eibar at Camp Nou.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Eibar in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 55, Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Barcelona's half?
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ousmane Dembele gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
In Barcelona Barcelona drive forward through Junior Firpo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 57, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 57, Kike is on target to give Eibar a 0-1 advantage.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Eibar.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Barcelona throw-in in Eibar's half.
In the minute 61, Barcelona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Throw-in for Eibar at Camp Nou.
In the minute 66, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a second substitution, with Philippe Coutinho replacing Miralem Pjanic.
The home team have replaced Antoine Griezmann with Trincao. This is the third substitution made today by Ronald Koeman.
Goal! Ousmane Dembele equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 67, That's a fine assist from Junior Firpo.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Eibar's area.
In the minute 71, Martin Braithwaite (Barcelona) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Eibar goal kick.
Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 72, Eibar to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Barcelona needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
Yoshinori Muto is replacing Kike for Eibar at Camp Nou.
In the minute 74, Jose Luis Mendilibar is making the team's second substitution at Camp Nou with Paulo Oliveira replacing Esteban Burgos.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Javier Alberola Rojas awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergio Alvarez (Eibar) has received a yellow card from Javier Alberola Rojas.
Throw-in for Eibar at Camp Nou.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 78, Clement Lenglet's header is off-target for Barcelona.
Eibar have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 81, Martin Braithwaite for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Eibar at Camp Nou.
Eibar make their third substitution with Recio replacing Damian Kadzior.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Clement Lenglet with Sergio Busquets.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick Barcelona.
Barcelona are coming forward and Philippe Coutinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
At Camp Nou, Recio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Pedri. The finish is off target, however.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Eibar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
Oscar Mingueza (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Barcelona drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Riqui Puig is on a sub for Pedri for Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Eibar.
At Camp Nou, Barcelona are penalized for being offside.
Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sergio Cubero is replacing Pape Diop for Eibar at Camp Nou.
